attributes.action: Review and stop ward clourses at Bishop Auckland Hospital.
attributes.background:
Bishop Auckland Hospital had been rebuilt and opened in 2002.
Ever since services has been reduced and wards closed, over the last few years Bishop Auckland town has been reinvigorated and is a visitor hotspot thanks to Kyren and the Auckland project.
We are in need of a fully functional hospital.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

This decision was made by the County Durham and Darlington NHS Foundation Trust, not the UK Government or Parliament. You can find out how to contact them here: https://www.cddft.nhs.uk/about-the-trust/contact-us.aspx
